words.tran_cn: 寡妇；残余物，[生物]残余体；未亡人

trans.tran_cn: 遗物，残遗物，残生物，遗孀
trans.tran_en: a group of animals or plants that exists as a remnant of a formerly widely distributed group in an environment different from that in which it originated
